entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to periods of rain or drizzle late in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
